forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 53F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers, with winds diminishing late. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low around 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High around 50F. Winds light and variable.
